items.name: Ext.app.bind.Multi
items.text: This class is created to manage a multi-bind against a `ViewModel`.

items.name: single
items.text:
This option instructs the binding to call its `destroy` method immediately after
delivering the initial value.

items.name: trackStatics
getScheduler
items.text: This method returns the `Scheduler` for this item.

items.name: schedule
items.text: Schedules this item with the associated Ext.util.Scheduler.

items.name: sort
unschedule
items.text: Unschedules this item with the associated Ext.util.Scheduler.
